title: EmpowerApps Show #31: “Future Proofing Your Apps with Gui Rambo”
description: In this episode, Leo Dion talks with Gui Rambo about how current apps could be built while taking into account possible future hardware from Apple. They also talk about apps for develors like Gui's WWDC Mac App, the new Apple Developers App, and CocoaHub, the new app by Pedro Carrasco.
